fr.ensimag.equipe3.controller

Class SignupController

  • Object
    • SignupController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ValidableForm

    public class SignupController
extends Object
implements ValidableForm
    This is the controller for the signup view. It handles the creation of a new user and saves it to the database if all the provided information is valid.
    Switches to views:
    LoginController
    This class modifies the database
